p: A chromatographically characterized polyherbal combination from B. diffusa, R. emodi, N. nucifera and C. nurvala was developed. The developed polyherbal combination showed significant antioxidant and XO inhibition potential in in-vitro assays and strong nephroprotective activity in methotrexate intoxicated rats. The developed polyherbal combination can be explored further for the management of drug-induced nephrotoxicity and other chronic kidney diseases.
